__e: Anyhow, somebody outside must have heard him holler because, when I was about to leave, there was a cop standing right there at the door.
Boy, you have no idea what your life would be like if I paid attention to what your father liked.
No, I remember, but, you know, just for those who might not have been paying attention at the time-- shame on you--
It would have been nice to hear you say that a minute ago.
Well, that's the stupidest thing I've ever heard in my life, and I've been listening to you for over 40 years.
You're not the barrister I would have chosen to defend my client, and if he'd listened to me, you wouldn't be here now.
If I had listened to my mother when I was a boy I wouldn't be seeing these days!
He couldn't have known about that, not unless he'd overheard the conversation between the doctor and the priest.
I should've listened to my mother. She said you were just like my father.
